level.text: Any use or structure permitted as a special exception in R-4 Districts under §§ 332.1 and 333 through 335 shall be permitted as a special exception in an R-5 District if approved by the Board of Zoning Adjustment under § 3104.
A college or university use permitted in R-4 Districts under § 332.2 shall be permitted as a special exception in an R-5 District if approved by the Zoning Commission under § 3104.

level.heading: SOURCE
level.text: § 3105.4 of the Zoning Regulations, effective May 12, 1958; as amended by Final Rulemaking published at 47 DCR 9725, 9731 (December 8, 2000).
